name: Meow Meow's Missing!
description:
You wake up from a short nap to find your beloved cat has gone missing- time to go find her!

Made in 2 days  for the Secret Santa Jam 2021.

Controls-

  • WASD/Arrow keys- Move around/Speed Up Text 
  • Space/Enter- Interact

Credits-

  • Sound effects- "Ambience, Public Place, Store, Supermarket 2", "Water, Waves, Ocean, Crashing On Rocks, Big 2", and "Fire, Burning, Wood, Crispy, Medium Intensity" from Soundly
  • Music-"Twelve Days Of Christmas", "Silent Night", "Sleighride" and "Deck The Halls" midis from https://www.westnet.com/Holiday/midi/
  • Audio implemented using Bitsy Muse UI by David Mowatt https://kool.tools/bitsy/tools/bitsymuse-ui/
  • Thumbnail Font- ZX Spectrum by myname5749 from https://www.dafont.com/
  • Thumbnail Image of Meow Meow provided by Almost Memes, and converted using https://ruin.itch.io/pixsy

I apologise  to all of Australians for my portrayal of your country, please forgive me!
